result.adr_address: Hong Kong Convention And Exhibition Centre, 1 Harbour Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong Convention And Exhibition Centre, 1 Harbour Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: Renaissance Hong Kong Harbour View Hotel

reviews.text:
Great hotel views and friendly staff. Quite conveniently located at the convention center but you’ll have to walk to Central or take the train to other location. 

We particular loved the view and the staffs here. They were very warm and friendly. We were upgraded and the room was lovely. We also have access to the lounge and it’s overly crowded.
Great location! Great views! Great service! Helpful staff! Comfortable bed! Great food! All in all a great Hong Kong experience!
Incredible service. Had an issue at booking and the front desk was able to fix the issue immediately. Plus incredible views from the room!
Great hotel and location... Club lounge gets busy in the afternoon but good selection of drinks and snacks... Hotel clean and friendly staff

If you're going to the convention center then it is hard to beat this hotel.  The harbor view rooms have an impressive view of the Hong Kong Harbor that I can't help but keep looking at.  I originally booked a Garden View room but was upgraded to this Harbor View room.  Unfortunately it was a very busy holiday weekend so all the suites were sold out so further upgrades were unavailable but they did at least try, so I appreciate that.  The room isn't very large and lacks a bit of landing space but suits a single business traveller fairly well.  Note that at least in my room there was no bathtub if that matters to you.  The A/C seems a bit finicky as there doesn't appear to be any automatic setting, but I think I've finally found a happy medium after three days of playing around with it.  The lounge is three stories tall with jaw dropping views of the harbor (see my first photo, the other harbor photos are from my room at different times of the day).  As the hotel was so busy the lounge was super crowded at breakfast and during evening cocktails, I gave up after about 10 minutes.  Breakfast in the restaurant is a free option for Marriott elite members and seemed to be pretty good with a broad range of options.  It's about a 5 minute walk to the closest metro station and there are tons of food options.  A pretty solid recommendation if you have business at the convention center.

result.vicinity: Hong Kong Convention And Exhibition Centre, 1 Harbour Road, Wan Chai

result.adr_address: 香港灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心
result.formatted_address: 香港灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心
result.name: 香港萬麗海景酒店

reviews.text: 自座尖餐👍👍食品價格合理

去咗食嘢(自助餐 dinner)，第二次去，總體很好😁，但也有進步空間🤔
食物方面，芝士焗龍蝦🍤都叫抵食，但係食三四個半隻(1.5~2隻)會幾飽下。面食🍲方面任夾餸，面都有四款。小菜同前菜少吃。海鮮太好，大部分不太新鮮。湯🥘同刺身都好味，但種類少。燒物普通，蝦🍤太黏殼，其他沒大問題。甜品🍰最好，幾多種類同好食
服務方面，侍應相當有禮😀。
環境乾淨企理。
價格💲偏$600/person
住宿方面……我無住🤣
呢間酒店餐廳可以話值，都可以話唔值。
要食蠔同龍蝦(仲要幾多下)先抵，請自行衡量，以下為照片以供參考。BTW大部分照片要打橫睇。
